typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SequenceNumber as long,
		Offset as string,
		EnqueuedTimeUtc as string,
		SystemProperties as string,
		Properties as string,
		Body as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 parse(ExteranlNotification = Body ? (Id as string, CommandId as string, NotificationType as string, MessageType as string, TimeStamp as date,  UserId as string, Data as string, Vin as string ) ,
		Vin = Body ? (Vin as string),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> Parse1
Parse1 derive(Vin = sha2(256, Vin)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		SequenceNumber,
		Offset,
		EnqueuedTimeUtc,
		SystemProperties,
		Properties,
		Body,
		FileName,
		VinTest = ExteranlNotification,
		IdTest = ExteranlNotification
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		HashedVehicleId as string,
		Id as string,
		CommandId as string,
		NotificationType as integer,
		MessageType as string,
		TimeStamp as timestamp,
		UserId as string,
		Data as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		HashedVehicleId = SequenceNumber,
		NotificationType = VinTest
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
